topic.title: Space Invaders With Image Sequences
topic.text:
game state.zip

Your project due Monday the 4th of April is to re-skin and add two features to the Space Invaders style shooter we developed in class.

Requirements:

  • The hero must have and image sequence
  • The enemies must have an image sequence
  • The bullets need to have an image
  • You must add two NEW features

Possible Features: these are suggestions, you can choose two of the following or think of two your own

  • Give the hero a health bar so it can receive multiple hits before the game is over
  • Create a win state, after you reach a certain score you "win" the game and get a winning screen
  • Make a second type of enemy
  • Make an enemy with a different flight pattern
  • Make a second weapon with a different shot pattern, triggered with a different key

Image Sequence Rules

  1. Use a png sequence and do not use numbers in the name 
  2. Try to limit the length of the image sequence to 30-50 frames
  3. Render the image sequence at the resolution you're actually going to use in the game
  4. Make sure to render RGBA images, with an alpha channel
